Description.Text: Experience Montevideo to the fullest, with stunning views of the waterfront and beautiful walking trails just steps from Hyatt Centric Montevideo. The hotel boasts an ideal location in the charming Pocitos neighborhood, with revered restaurants, historic structures, and endless beaches to explore. The Hyatt Centric Montevideo is situated in the Pocitos neighbourhood, and is 5 km from Cagancha Square and 6 km from Montevideo Port's Market. The nearest airport is Carrasco International Airport within 18 km from the property.
Three Restaurants are available for breakfast, lunch and dinner at this property
This accommodation has a medium lobby.
